title: patcher kernel
body: whenever i try and open league it just shows the logo and then it says PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working. i uninstalled and installed it all over again and it does the same thing. its been doing it for 12 hours now. someone please help me.

replies.body: I just had the same problem and what fixed was right click on the league logo, click properties, then in advance run it as administrator, then hit apply and then OPEN IT!!!

This error is usually a result of a permissions problem that's blocking the patch from launching.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get back in game!  Let me know if you have any questions.
